<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Familiar Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=2241) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 48</row>

**Archetype** [Spellmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=32)

**Prerequisites**
[Spellmaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1134)

</column>

---

You can use your magic to transform into a small creature of a type that commonly serves as a spellcaster's familiar, potentially allowing you to safely scout for your party while retaining a degree of spellcasting ability. You gain the [_familiar form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=832) focus spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
name: Familiar Form
